description: HARA connects rural smallholder farmers with banks, insurance companies, and input producers.

Harmony Cosmetics caters to natural beauty consumers with its “Herbal Essentials” brand, an all-natural UAE-established personal care brand that offers its clients high-quality, yet affordable, all-natural beauty products.
HealthPlus Group brings Nigerians health and beauty products that they can trust.
Helium Health is a healthcare technology company focused on digitizing and promoting data-driven healthcare in Nigeria.
Hellas Direct is a digital-first, full-stack insurance company focused on car & home insurance.
HelloPaisa is the leading digital remittance company in Southern Africa and focuses on financial inclusion of migrant workers and informal micro-merchants.
The leading food delivery company in Bulgaria and Romania, HelloHungry provides customers the fastest and easiest way to order food wherever they are.

Heng Hiap is a fully integrated plastic recycling company that collects used ocean plastics and transforms them into reusable energy and industrial material. It was the first company in the world to receive Ocean Bound Plastic certification co-developed by NGO Zero Plastic Oceans and Control Union.
Hintrag manufactures high quality yet affordable and healthy powdered desserts and drinks customized for every region, using all natural flavors and neither artificial preservatives nor GMOs.
Hogaru is a digital facility management platform that provides professional cleaning services for small and medium sized businesses and households in Latin America.
Holistik makes 100% natural frozen fruit bars and smoothies that are vegan, low-calorie, gluten free, dairy free, and non-GMO.

Home Burgers is a fast-casual restaurant chain that combines the price, speed and convenience of a fast-food restaurant with the high-quality products and experience of a full-service restaurant. Home Burgers offers a very simple but high-quality menu comprised of three types of burgers.
HotelBrain is a hotel management company in Greece focused exclusively on operating luxury boutique hotels.

Housi is reinventing the wheel within the real estate sector by offering its services to key stakeholders in the industry’s value chain. The company is an asset-light platform that delivers “housing-on-demand”.
HungerStation facilitates online food ordering, tracking and delivery through its website and mobile app.

Hunter Foods produces a wide range of specialty and gourmet packaged foods under its own brands in the “Better For You” snacks segment in the Middle East and Asia. It is also the exclusive distributor in the region for leading cereal, biscuit, and nuts from the US, UK, Europe and Asia.
I.Systems applies artificial intelligence to provide industry 4.0 software solutions that control industrial processes to reduce variation and ensure they are running at the optimal efficiency level.

description: Ibushak is an e-commerce solution for design, marketing, billing, fraud prevention, logistics, payments, customer service and much more.
IDwall is a regulation tech company that develops automated identity validation solutions, simplifying user onboarding for organizations in a variety of industries.
iHandal is provides sustainable engineering solutions that help businesses maximize their energy and operational savings.
